General.Name: Aries Agro Limited
General.Description: Aries Agro Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacture and supply of micronutrients and other nutritional products for plants and animals in India, Kenya, Nepal, Taiwan, and the United Arab Emirates. Its products include water soluble NPKs, organic/bio products, high density inputs, crop specific products, slow release fertilizers, plant protection products, aqua culture and animal nutrition products, urban products, and other products. The company was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
